subject: Re: Ghost Box in a Faraday Cage type enclosure
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi Misty,

I'm glad you shared what you heard... I thought I heard something 
like that too. I also thought I heard the word "Peace" a number of 
times.

- Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> Interesting Mike. Frank spoke about making a copper box because 
they mentioned it. I kept saying reminds me of a faraday cage. Also 
interesting when you shut the door and its on AM at 1:54 in the video 
I hear "Your ghostbox box". I hear a little more after that but thats 
what I hear clearest LOL
> 
> A box for your box. LOL at least you didnt press the on button.
> 
> Misty
> 
>

> > While reading a book about spirit communication, there was a
> > chapter 
> > which referenced the Faraday Cage.  So... after reading it

> > try out what the book suggested and placed my Radio Shack
> > Hack 12-470

> > ran a sweep

> > The AM mode did receive much less but a few audio snippets
> > did make 
> > their way through.  The FM mode was a different story. No
> > frequencies 
> > at all made it through... just white noise as each FM
> > frequency was 
> > reached during the sweep.
> > As I always do... I made a short video of both modes being
> > sweeped.
